rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
Contains bare negation/factual reporting of low number; 'documented' and 'reported' are plain outcome verbs.
Segment does not contain a question.
This segment reports no human cases in US and one in Europe, bare positive facts.
The segment uses 'only one' but lacks an explicit contrasting scale context (no 'out of X' or 'among Y').
The segment contains the bare negation 'No human cases have been documented' without an explicit calming cue.
